project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a specified city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement function to get weather data for a city using a public API
Create a function to parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Implement a function to display the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the functions above to ensure they work correctly
Execute tests on all implemented functions to verify correct functionality
